name: Carvalho: Los Pájaros de Bangkok
storyline:
Nothing made Carvalho suppose that he would return to the Bangkok of his youth.

As if harsh Barcelona weren't enough for him, he was forced to go in search of a friend, some memories, a past ... and he found something else.
summary: Carvalho: Los Pájaros de Bangkok is a conversational adventure game with the detective Pepe Carvalho as the main character, based on the successful novel The birds of Bangkok.
